Package curam.util.persistence.helper

Contains helper classes for commonly-used patterns in object/relational mappings.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Commented Interface for objects which store free-text comments data.
EventDispatcherFactory<EVENT> Stores a collection of listeners to be notified when an event occurs.
Lifecycle<S> Interface for objects which have a lifecycle.
LifecycleStateTransitionEvent<S,L extends Lifecycle<S>> The hook points for all state transition events.
LinkTable<L extends StandardEntity,R extends StandardEntity> A simple link table.
LogicallyDeleteable Indicates that the entity supports logical deletes, by virtue of its record status.
Named Interface for objects which have a name (in a single language).
 

Class Summary
BasePlusConcreteTableImpl<I,E extends Entity<I>,D extends DeepCloneable,C extends DeepCloneable> Helper class for implementing a logical entity which is physically stored on: a 'base' table and a 'concrete' table The base table may be "shared" by several concrete tables.
CodetableState<V extends CodeTableEntry> Encapsulates the processing associated with state transitions for a state machine which stores its state as a codetable value.
EntityImpl Helper base class for entity implementations.
EventDispatcherCacheEntry<T> Entry in cache of event dispatchers.
LifecycleHelper Helper class for managing objects which extend Lifecycle.
LifecycleStateTransitionEventDefaultListener<S,L extends Lifecycle<S>> The default listener for lifecycle state transition events.
LinkTableImpl<S extends DeepCloneable,L extends StandardEntity,R extends StandardEntity> Standard implementation of LinkTable, where the link information is stored on a single database table without optimistic lock support.
ReadOnlyEntityImpl<I,D extends DeepCloneable> Standard implementation to read a database table.
SingleTableEntityImpl<S extends DeepCloneable> Standard implementation for an entity.
SingleTableLogicallyDeleteableEntityImpl<S extends DeepCloneable> Standard implementation for a commonly-used Curam application pattern.
State<V> Encapsulates the processing associated with state transitions for a state machine.
Transition<V> Encapsulates the processing specific to a particular permitted state transition for a state machine.
 

Package curam.util.persistence.helper Description

Contains helper classes for commonly-used patterns in object/relational mappings.
